tool_description: Evaluates venue characteristics for photography planning, including lighting conditions, space constraints, and equipment requirements.

venue_type.description: Type of venue (indoor, outdoor, mixed, church, hall, garden, beach, historic)

lighting_conditions.description: Primary lighting conditions (natural, artificial, mixed, low_light)

space_size.description: Venue size category (intimate, medium, large, grand)

error_messages: Invalid venue type: Use one of [indoor, outdoor, mixed, church, hall, garden, beach, historic]
Invalid lighting conditions: Use one of [natural, artificial, mixed, low_light]
Invalid space size: Use one of [intimate, medium, large, grand]
Empty venue name: Provide a valid venue name
usage: Provide venue_name, venue_type, lighting_conditions, and space_size. Optionally include photography_restrictions array.

venue_id.description: Unique identifier for the venue assessment

equipment_recommendations.description: Recommended equipment based on venue characteristics
